trans-unit.source: --help
trans-unit.target: - 救命

trans-unit.source: A german page for OOoPy exists at runtux.com
trans-unit.target: A german page for OOoPy exists at runtux.com

trans-unit.source: A, well, there are command-line utilities now:
trans-unit.target: A, well, there are command-line utilities now:

trans-unit.source: Add –newlines option to ooo_as_text: With this option the paragraphs in the office document are preserved in the text output. Fix assertion error with python2.7, thanks to Hans-Peter Jansen for the report. Several other small fixes for python2.7 vs. 2.6.
trans-unit.target: Add –newlines option to ooo_as_text: With this option the paragraphs in the office document are preserved in the text output. Fix assertion error with python2.7, thanks to Hans-Peter Jansen for the report. Several other small fixes for python2.7 vs. 2.6.

trans-unit.source: Add Manifest_Append transform to update META-INF/manifest.xml with added filenames
trans-unit.target: 添加 Manifest_Append 变换来更新 META-INF/manifest.xml 的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Add a list of filenames + contents to Transformer
trans-unit.target: 添加文件名+内容的列表到Transformer。

trans-unit.source: Add copyright (LGPL) notice to command-line utilities, fixes SF Bug 2650042
trans-unit.target: 在命令行工具中加入版权(LGPL)声明,修正SF Bug 2650042。

trans-unit.source: Add hook in OOoPy for adding files
trans-unit.target: 在OOoPy中添加钩子,用于添加文件。

trans-unit.source: Add ooo_fieldreplace, ooo_cat, ooo_mailmerge command-line utilities. Fix ooo_as_text to allow specification of output-file. Note that handling of non-seekable input/output (pipes) for command-line utils will work only starting with python2.5. Minor bug-fix when concatenating documents.
trans-unit.target: 增加了ooo_fieldreplace,ooo_cat,ooo_mailmerge命令行工具。修正 ooo_as_text,允许指定输出文件。需要注意的是,命令行工具对非可寻的输入/输出(管道)的处理,只有在 python2.5 时才会生效。修正了连接文档时的小错误。

trans-unit.source: Add ooo_grep to search for OOo files containing a pattern. Thanks to Mathieu Chauvinc for the reporting the problems with modified manifest.xml. Support python2.6, thanks to Erik Myllymaki for reporting and anonymous contributor(s) for confirming the bug.
trans-unit.target: 增加ooo_grep来搜索包含模式的OOo文件。感谢 Mathieu Chauvinc 报告修改 manifest.xml 的问题。支持 python2.6,感谢 Erik Myllymaki 的报告和匿名贡献者的确认。

trans-unit.source: Add some checks for new API – first parameter of Transformer is checked now
trans-unit.target: Add some checks for new API – first parameter of Transformer is checked now

trans-unit.source: Add some missing namespaces (ooo 2009)
trans-unit.target: 增加一些缺失的命名空间(ooo 2009)

trans-unit.source: All OOo files and other files needed for testing are now in the subdirectory
trans-unit.target: 所有的OOo文件和其他测试所需的文件现在都在子目录中。

trans-unit.source: All command line utilities are now in subdirectory
trans-unit.target: 所有的命令行工具现在都在子目录下。

trans-unit.source: All utilities take a
trans-unit.target: 所有的公用事业都需要

trans-unit.source: Applications like this come in handy in applications where calling native OOo is not an option, e.g., in server-side Web applications.
trans-unit.target: 这样的应用在不能调用原生OOo的应用中很方便,例如,在服务器端的Web应用中。

trans-unit.source: Author:
trans-unit.target: 作者:

trans-unit.source: Both should report no failed tests.
trans-unit.target: 两者都应报告没有失败的测试。

trans-unit.source: Built-in elementtree support from python2.5 is used if available
trans-unit.target: 如果可用,则使用python2.5的内置elementtree支持。

trans-unit.source: Changes
trans-unit.target: 变化

trans-unit.source: Distribute a missing file that is used in the doctest. Fix directory structure. Thanks to Michael Nagel for suggesting the change and reporting the bug.
trans-unit.target: 分发一个在doctest中使用的缺失文件。修正目录结构。感谢Michael Nagel提出修改建议并报告了这个错误。

trans-unit.source: Dont use redirection when calling system, use -i option for input file instead. Redirection seems to be a problem on windows.
trans-unit.target: 调用系统时不要使用重定向,而是使用-i选项来输入文件。重定向在windows上似乎是个问题。

trans-unit.source: Ensure mimetype is the first element in the resulting archive, seems OOo is picky about this.
trans-unit.target: 确保mimetype是生成的存档中的第一个元素,似乎OOo对这个很挑剔。

trans-unit.source: Explicitly call the python-interpreter, running a script directly is not supported on windows.
trans-unit.target: 明确调用python解释器,windows上不支持直接运行脚本。

trans-unit.source: Finally – since OOoPy is in production in some projects – change the development status to “Production/Stable”.
trans-unit.target: Finally – since OOoPy is in production in some projects – change the development status to “Production/Stable”.

trans-unit.source: Fix Doctest to hopefully run on windows. Thanks to Dani Budinova for testing thoroughly under windows.
trans-unit.target: 修复Doctest,希望能在windows下运行。感谢Dani Budinova在windows下的彻底测试。

trans-unit.source: Fix MANIFEST.in to include all files needed for regression test (doctest).
trans-unit.target: 修正MANIFEST.in,以包含回归测试(doctest)所需的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: Fix _divide (used for dividing body into parts that must keep sequence). If one of the sections was empty, body parts would change sequence.
trans-unit.target: 修正_divide(用于将身体分成必须保持顺序的部分)。如果其中一个部分是空的,主体部分将改变顺序。

trans-unit.source: Fix bug in optimisation of original document for concatenation
trans-unit.target: 修正原始文档优化中的连词错误

trans-unit.source: Fix compression: when writing new XML-files these would be stored instead of compressed in the OOo zip-file resulting in big documents. Thanks to Hans-Peter Jansen for the patch. Add copyright notice to command-line utils (SF Bug 2650042). Fix mailmerge for OOo 3.X lists (SF Bug 2949643).
trans-unit.target: 修正压缩问题:当编写新的XML文件时,这些文件将被存储,而不是压缩在OOo压缩文件中,导致文件变大。感谢 Hans-Peter Jansen 提供的补丁。在命令行工具中添加版权声明(SF Bug 2650042)。修正OOo 3.X列表的邮件合并问题(SF Bug 2949643)。

trans-unit.source: Fix css stylesheet
trans-unit.target: 修正css样式表

trans-unit.source: Fix for python2.6 behavior that __init__ of object may not take any arguments. Fixes SF Bug 2948617.
trans-unit.target: 修正了 python2.6 中 __init__对象可能不接受任何参数的行为。修正了 SF Bug 2948617。

trans-unit.source: Fix handling of cases where we don’t have a paragraph (only list) elements
trans-unit.target: Fix handling of cases where we don’t have a paragraph (only list) elements

trans-unit.source: Fix ooo_as_text to include more command-line handling
trans-unit.target: 修正ooo_as_text,加入更多的命令行操作。

trans-unit.source: Fix reading/writing stdin/stdout for command-line utilities, this will work reliably (reading/writing non-seekable input/output like, e.g., pipes) only with python2.5
trans-unit.target: 修正命令行工具的stdin/stdout的读写问题,只有在python2.5下才能可靠地工作(读写非可寻的输入/输出,如管道)。

trans-unit.source: Fix setting csv delimiter in ooo_mailmerge
trans-unit.target: 修正在ooo_mailmerge中设置csv分隔符的问题。

trans-unit.source: Fix style renaming for table styles when concatenating documents
trans-unit.target: 当连接文档时,修复表格样式的重命名。

trans-unit.source: For documentation about the OOo XML file format, see the book by J. David Eisenberg called OASIS OpenDocument Essentials which is under the Gnu Free Documentation License and is also available in print. For a reference document you may want to check out the XML File Format Specification (PDF) by OpenOffice.org.
trans-unit.target: For documentation about the OOo XML file format, see the book by J. David Eisenberg called OASIS OpenDocument Essentials which is under the Gnu Free Documentation License and is also available in print. For a reference document you may want to check out the XML File Format Specification (PDF) by OpenOffice.org.

trans-unit.source: Help, I’m getting an AssertionError traceback from Transformer, e.g.:
trans-unit.target: Help, I’m getting an AssertionError traceback from Transformer, e.g.:

trans-unit.source: If the mailmerge transform doesn’t work for your document: The OOo format is well documented but there are ordering constraints in the body of an OOo document. I’ve not yet figured out all the tags and their order in the OOo body. Individual elements in an OOo document (like e.g., frames, sections, tables) need to have their own unique names. After a mailmerge, there are duplicate names for some items. So far I’m renumbering only frames, sections, and tables. See the renumber objects at the end of ooopy/Transforms.py. So if you encounter missing parts of the mailmerged document, check if there are some renumberings missing or send me a bug report.
trans-unit.target: If the mailmerge transform doesn’t work for your document: The OOo format is well documented but there are ordering constraints in the body of an OOo document. I’ve not yet figured out all the tags and their order in the OOo body. Individual elements in an OOo document (like e.g., frames, sections, tables) need to have their own unique names. After a mailmerge, there are duplicate names for some items. So far I’m renumbering only frames, sections, and tables. See the renumber objects at the end of ooopy/Transforms.py. So if you encounter missing parts of the mailmerged document, check if there are some renumberings missing or send me a bug report.

trans-unit.source: Implement ooo_cat
trans-unit.target: 实现ooo_cat

trans-unit.source: In addition to being a wrapper for ElementTree, OOoPy contains a framework for applying XML transforms to OOo documents. Several Transforms for OOo documents exist, e.g., for changing OOo fields (OOo Insert-Fields menu) or using OOo fields for a mail merge application. Some other transformations for modifying OOo settings and meta information are also given as examples.
trans-unit.target: 除了作为ElementTree的封装器,OOoPy还包含了一个将XML转换应用于OOo文档的框架。有一些针对OOo文档的转换,例如,用于改变OOo字段(OOo Insert-Fields菜单)或在邮件合并应用程序中使用OOo字段。其他一些用于修改OOo设置和元信息的变换也作为例子给出。

trans-unit.source: Link to SF logo for Homepage
trans-unit.target: 链接到SF标志的主页

trans-unit.source: Link to other information updated
trans-unit.target: 与其他信息更新的链接

trans-unit.source: New attribute mimetype of OOoPy – this is automatically set when reading a document, and should be set when writing one.
trans-unit.target: New attribute mimetype of OOoPy – this is automatically set when reading a document, and should be set when writing one.

trans-unit.source: New shell-script ooo_grep (does equivalent to grep -l on OOo Files)
trans-unit.target: 新的 shell 脚本 ooo_grep (相当于在 OOo 文件上的 grep -l)

trans-unit.source: Now ooo_cat fixes tables styles when concatenating (renaming): We optimize style usage by re-using existing styles. But for some table styles the original names were not renamed to the re-used ones. Fixes SF Bug 10, thanks to Claudio Girlanda for reporting.
trans-unit.target: 现在,ooo_cat修复了表格在连接(重命名)时的样式。我们通过重用现有的样式来优化样式的使用。但是对于一些表的样式,原来的名称没有被重命名为重用的样式。修复了SF Bug 10,感谢Claudio Girlanda的报告。

trans-unit.source: Now ooo_cat supports pictures, thanks to Antonio Sánchez for reporting that this wasn’t working.
trans-unit.target: Now ooo_cat supports pictures, thanks to Antonio Sánchez for reporting that this wasn’t working.

trans-unit.source: Now ooo_mailmerge uses the delimiter option, it was ignored before. Thanks to Bob Danek for report and test.
trans-unit.target: 现在ooo_mailmerge使用了定界符选项,以前是忽略的。感谢Bob Danek的报告和测试。

trans-unit.source: Now works with version 2.X of OpenOffice.org. Minor API changes.
trans-unit.target: 现在可以和OpenOffice.org的2.X版本一起使用。小的API变化。

trans-unit.source: OOo 3.X adds xml:id tags to lists, we now renumber these in the mailmerge app., fixes SF Bug 2949643
trans-unit.target: OOo 3.X增加了xml:id标签到列表,现在我们在mailmerge应用中对这些标签进行了重新编号,修复了SF Bug 2949643。

trans-unit.source: OOoPy now works for OOo version 1.X and version 2.X
trans-unit.target: OOoPy现在适用于OOo 1.X和2.X版本。

trans-unit.source: OOoPy: Modify OpenOffice.org documents in Python
trans-unit.target: OOoPy。用Python修改OpenOffice.org文档

trans-unit.source: On deletion of an OOoPy object close it explicitly (uses __del__)
trans-unit.target: 在删除一个OOoPy对象时,明确地关闭它(使用__del__)

trans-unit.source: Open output-files in “wb” mode instead of “w” in doctest to not create corrupt OOo documents on windows.
trans-unit.target: Open output-files in “wb” mode instead of “w” in doctest to not create corrupt OOo documents on windows.

trans-unit.source: OpenOffice.org (OOo) documents are ZIP archives containing several XML files. Therefore it is easy to inspect, create, or modify OOo documents. OOoPy is a library in Python for these tasks with OOo documents. To not reinvent the wheel, OOoPy uses an existing XML library, ElementTree by Fredrik Lundh (which is in the Python standard library for quite some time now). OOoPy is a thin wrapper around ElementTree using Python’s ZipFile to read and write OOo documents.
trans-unit.target: OpenOffice.org (OOo) documents are ZIP archives containing several XML files. Therefore it is easy to inspect, create, or modify OOo documents. OOoPy is a library in Python for these tasks with OOo documents. To not reinvent the wheel, OOoPy uses an existing XML library, ElementTree by Fredrik Lundh (which is in the Python standard library for quite some time now). OOoPy is a thin wrapper around ElementTree using Python’s ZipFile to read and write OOo documents.

trans-unit.source: Small Documentation changes
trans-unit.target: 文件的小改动

trans-unit.source: Still working with lower python versions but I’m only able to test with 2.7, nothing earlier. Bug fixes where sometimes multiple Set_Attribute transformations (e.g. when concatenating OO documents) would be applied to the same tag/attribute combination. Also fix a bug with the computation of default tabulators when concatenating documents.
trans-unit.target: Still working with lower python versions but I’m only able to test with 2.7, nothing earlier. Bug fixes where sometimes multiple Set_Attribute transformations (e.g. when concatenating OO documents) would be applied to the same tag/attribute combination. Also fix a bug with the computation of default tabulators when concatenating documents.

trans-unit.source: Tested with python 2.3, 2.4, 2.5
trans-unit.target: 用python 2.3,2.4,2.5测试。

trans-unit.source: The API changed slightly when implementing handling of different versions of OOo files. Now the first parameter you pass to the Transformer constructor is the mimetype of the OpenOffice.org document you intend to transform. The mimetype can be fetched from another opened OOo document, e.g.:
trans-unit.target: 在实现处理不同版本的OOo文件时,API略有改变。现在,您传递给Transformer构造函数的第一个参数是您打算转换的OpenOffice.org文档的mimetype。这个mimetype可以从另一个打开的OOo文档中获取,比如:。

trans-unit.source: Version 2.0: Port to Python3
trans-unit.target: 2.0版本。移植到Python3

trans-unit.source: Version numbers in documentation fixed
trans-unit.target: 修正文档中的版本号

trans-unit.source: When modifying (or creating) archive members, we create the OOo archive as if it was a DOS system (type fat) and ensure we use the current date/time (UTC). This also fixes problems with file permissions on newer versions of pythons ZipFile.
trans-unit.target: 当修改(或创建)存档成员时,我们会像创建DOS系统(类型为fat)一样创建OOo存档,并确保我们使用当前的日期/时间(UTC)。这也修复了新版本的python ZipFile上的文件权限问题。

trans-unit.source: When modifying the manifest the resulting .odt file could not be opened by OOo. So when modifying manifest make sure the manifest namespace is named “manifest” not something auto-generated by ElementTree. I consider this a bug in OOo to require this. This now uses the _namespace_map of ElementTree and uses the same names as OOo for all namespaces. The META-INF/manifest.xml is now in the list of files to which Transforms can be applied.
trans-unit.target: When modifying the manifest the resulting .odt file could not be opened by OOo. So when modifying manifest make sure the manifest namespace is named “manifest” not something auto-generated by ElementTree. I consider this a bug in OOo to require this. This now uses the _namespace_map of ElementTree and uses the same names as OOo for all namespaces. The META-INF/manifest.xml is now in the list of files to which Transforms can be applied.

trans-unit.source: You need at least version 2.7 of python. Now also tested with 3.5, will probably work with later versions, too.
trans-unit.target: 你至少需要2.7版本的python。现在也用3.5版本测试过了,可能也能用以后的版本。

trans-unit.source: implement ooo_fieldreplace and ooo_mailmerge
trans-unit.target: 实现ooo_fieldreplace和ooo_mailmerge。

trans-unit.source: now release ooo_prettyxml – I’ve used this for testing for quite some time, may be useful to others
trans-unit.target: now release ooo_prettyxml – I’ve used this for testing for quite some time, may be useful to others

trans-unit.source: ooo_as_text for getting the text from an OOo-File (e.g., for doing a “grep” on the output).
trans-unit.target: ooo_as_text for getting the text from an OOo-File (e.g., for doing a “grep” on the output).

trans-unit.source: ooo_cat for concatenating several OOo files into one
trans-unit.target: ooo_cat用于将多个OOo文件连接成一个文件。

trans-unit.source: ooo_fieldreplace for replacing fields in an OOo document
trans-unit.target: ooo_fieldreplace用于替换OOo文档中的字段。

trans-unit.source: ooo_grep to do equivalent of grep -l on OOo files – only runs on Unix-like operating systems, probably only with the GNU version of grep (it’s a shell-script using ooo_as_text) Note that the -l option of grep only prints the matching filenames.
trans-unit.target: ooo_grep to do equivalent of grep -l on OOo files – only runs on Unix-like operating systems, probably only with the GNU version of grep (it’s a shell-script using ooo_as_text) Note that the -l option of grep only prints the matching filenames.

trans-unit.source: ooo_mailmerge for doing a mailmerge from a template OOo document and a CSV (comma separated values) input
trans-unit.target: ooo_mailmerge用于从OOo模板文档和CSV(逗号分隔值)输入中进行邮件合并。

trans-unit.source: ooo_prettyxml for pretty-printing the XML nodes of one of the XML files inside an OOo document. Mainly useful for debugging.
trans-unit.target: ooo_prettyxml 用于在OOo文档中漂亮地打印其中一个XML文件的XML节点。主要用于调试。

trans-unit.source: option.
trans-unit.target: 选项。

trans-unit.source: remove zip compression sizes from regression test: the compressor in python2.7 is better than the one in python2.6
trans-unit.target: 从回归测试中删除zip压缩大小:python2.7中的压缩器比python2.6中的好。

trans-unit.source: renumber_all, get_meta, set_meta are now factory functions that take the mimetype of the open office document as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: renumber_all、get_meta、set_meta 现在是工厂函数,以打开的 office 文档的 mimetype 作为参数。

trans-unit.source: tell me exactly what you did.
trans-unit.target: 告诉我你到底做了什么
